name: backup-manager/symfony
description: A simple database backup manager for Symfony2 with support for S3, Rackspace, Dropbox, FTP, SFTP.

suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v2: to use AWS S3, version 2 (compatible with other vendors like Google Cloud Storage or ExoScale)
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: to use AWS S3, version 3 (compatible with newer aws-regions like Frankfurt/Europe)
